prompts: Create a dual-type Pokemon that resembles a lizard with fiery patterns on its body.
Imagine a small reptilian Pokemon that thrives in volcanic environments with vibrant colors.
Design a cunning fire and poison Pokemon that can camouflage in its surroundings.
Generate an image of a lizard-like Pokemon with unique elemental abilities and a sleek design.
Show me a Pokemon that has dark scales with bright orange accents, ready to battle!
Make a detailed description of a Pokemon that has a mischievous personality and loves to explore.
Give me a Pokemon that can adapt to both forest and urban habitats with its stealthy movements.

distinctive_features: Bright red markings on the back

semantic_attributes.combat_style: Agile and stealthy, utilizing hit-and-run tactics
